trans-unit.target: 基本用法 不含POS标签

trans-unit.source: Lemmy can also by used without spaCy, as a standalone lemmatizer. In that case, you will have to provide the POS tags. Alternatively, you can use Lemmy without POS tags, though most likely the accuracy will suffer. Currrently, only the Danish Lemmy model comes with a model trained for use without POS tags. That is, if you want to use Lemmy on Swedish text without POS tags, you must train your own Lemmy model.
trans-unit.target: Lemmy也可以在不使用spaCy的情况下,作为一个独立的词库使用。在这种情况下,你必须提供POS标签。另外,你也可以在没有POS标签的情况下使用Lemmy,不过很可能准确性会受到影响。目前,只有丹麦的Lemmy模型带有一个经过训练的模型,可以在没有POS标签的情况下使用。也就是说,如果你想在没有POS标签的瑞典文本上使用Lemmy,你必须训练自己的Lemmy模型。

trans-unit.source: Lemmy is a lemmatizer for Danish 🇩🇰 and Swedish 🇸🇪. It comes ready for use. The Danish model is trained on Dansk Sprognævn's (DSN) word list (‘fuldformliste’) and the Danish Universal Dependencies. The Swedish model is trained on the SALDO's morphology dataset and the Swedish Universal Dependencies (Talbanken). Lemmy also supports training on your own dataset.
trans-unit.target: Lemmy是丹麦语🇩🇰和瑞典语🇸🇪的象征词。它可以使用了。丹麦语模型在DanskSprognævn（DSN）单词表（'fuldformliste'）和丹麦语通用依存关系上进行了训练 。瑞典模型在SALDO的形态数据集和瑞典 普遍依赖性（Talbanken）上得到了训练。Lemmy还支持在您自己的数据集上进行训练。

trans-unit.source: Lemmy is heavily inspired by the CST Lemmatizer for Danish.
trans-unit.target: Lemmy受到CST丹麦的Lemmatizer的极大启发。

trans-unit.source: The notebooks folder contains examples showing how to train your own model using Lemmy.
trans-unit.target: 该 notebooks 文件夹中包含示例来说明如何使用米来训练自己的模型。

trans-unit.source: The models included in Lemmy were evaluated on the respective Universal Dependencies dev datasets. The Danish model scored > 99% accuracy, while the Swedish model scored > 97%. All reported scores were obtained when supplying Lemmy with POS tags.
trans-unit.target: Lemmy中包含的模型在各自的Universal Dependencies开发数据集上进行了评估。丹麦模型的准确度> 99％，而瑞典模型的准确度> 97％。向Lemmy提供POS标签时，会获得所有报告的分数。

trans-unit.source: You can use Lemmy as a spaCy extension, more specifcally a spaCy pipeline component. This is highly recommended and makes the lemmas easily accessible from the spaCy tokens. Lemmy makes use of POS tags to predict the lemmas. When wired up to the spaCy pipeline, Lemmy has the benefit of using spaCy’s builtin POS tagger.
trans-unit.target: 您可以将Lemmy用作spaCy扩展，更具体地说是spaCy管道组件。强烈建议这样做，并使得从spaCy令牌轻松访问引理。Lemmy利用POS标签预测引理。当连接到spaCy管道时，Lemmy可以使用spaCy的内置POS标记器。
